channel.title: Delta - how to make items donator only? will rep
channel.description: will rep when i can, need 1 more rep then i can so i will then but yea i need to make certain items donators only, help please? :)

item.title: Delta - how to make items donator only? will rep
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“Editt, post:2, topic:312727”]if(wearID == THE ID && (donator != 1)) { // donater item
sM(“you need to be a donater to wear this”);
return false;
}[/quote]

what if my character donator is this…
character-donator = 2

and btw, nice sig lmao
